title: Boutique Grampians Homestead Indulgence with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Three-Course Dinner
description:
Country charm meets contemporary elegance at this boutique homestead, surrounded by the boundless beauty of the Grampians in Victoria. This sprawling 1800s estate has been restored to its former glory following a 2022 renovation, yet still exudes the nostalgia of the pioneering Australian spirit.

This heritage homestead sits among a picturesque five-acre garden, providing a magical setting to unwind and relax away from the stresses of everyday life. Discover the ideal launchpad to explore the region's abundance of beauty, with the trails of the Grampians National Park within easy driving distance.

A commitment to farm-to-fork culinary excellence rounds out the perfect regional stay: mornings begin with an a la carte breakfast with barista-poured coffee, while evenings are made special with an indulgent three-course dinner prepared by the hotel's executive chef.
offer_address: 118 Mount William Estate Road, Willaura, Victoria 3379, Australia

title: Grampians Heritage Homestead Group Escape with Private Chef Dinner & Daily Breakfast
description:
Country charm meets contemporary elegance at historic boutique homestead Mount William Station, surrounded by the boundless beauty of the Grampians. The 1800s estate has been restored to its former glory following a 2022 renovation, yet still exudes the nostalgia of the pioneering Australian spirit. This heritage homestead sits among a picturesque five-acre garden, providing a magical setting to unwind and relax away from the hustle and bustle of city life. Laze by the pool, play tennis or stop and appreciate the small things in the rose garden. After full days, relax with banter over a drink by the fire or gather together for a meal in the country kitchen. Best of all, you'll have exclusive use of the homestead for your group, so the facilities are yours to enjoy.

Located on the fringe of the beautiful Grampians National Park, this gorgeous property is well-placed for discovering the regionâ€™s abundance of natural beauty, historical significance and sweeping hiking trails. The homestead feels like a world away on its 7,500-acre estate, where you're promised complete privacy and serenity.
offer_address: 118 Mount William Estate Road, Willaura, Victoria 3379, Australia
